stg_stay_addr:
SELECT st.stay_file_cnsmr_id, st.bus_nm, st.addr_typ, st.addr_ln_1, 
st.addr_ln_2, st.addr_ln_3, st.addr_ln_4, st.cty_nm, st.st_cd, st.post_cd,
st.cntry_cd, st.lat, st.long, cast(sq.job_run_id as bigint) as btch_num,
st.data_src_nm, st.src_file_nm, st.cur_rec_ind, st.job_sess_id, 
sq.job_run_id, st.usr_cmnt, 'Glue' as create_by,
st.create_usr, cast('{0}' as timestamp) as create_ts, sq.filepath as file_nm
FROM stg_stay_temp st left join id_temp sq 
on SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(st.src_file_nm,'/',-1),'.',1) 
= SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(sq.filepath,'/',-1),'.',1)
stg_stay_guest:
SELECT cast(sq.job_run_id as varchar) as btch_num, st.src_nm, st.btch_create_dt, st.btch_create_tm, st.dt_from,
st.dt_thru, st.stg_load_strt_ts, st.stg_load_cmpl_ts, 
st.std_load_strt_ts, st.std_load_cmpl_ts, st.mdm_load_strt_ts, 
st.mdm_load_cmpl_ts, 
case when err.error_token is null then 'S' else 'F'
end as btch_sts, st.btch_sts_ts, st.btch_stg, 
st.src_file_nm, st.cur_rec_ind, 
case when err.error_token is null then 'S' else 'F'
end as rs_btch_sts,
st.updt_usr, st.updt_ts, cast(st.job_sess_id as bigint), 
cast(sq.job_run_id as bigint), st.usr_cmnt, 'Glue' as create_by,
cast('{0}' as timestamp) as create_ts, sq.filepath as file_nm
FROM stg_stay_temp st 
left join id_temp sq 
on SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(st.src_file_nm,'/',-1),'.',1) 
= SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(sq.filepath,'/',-1),'.',1)
left join (select distinct SUBSTRING_INDEX(raw_line,',',1) as error_token,
err_reason from RSerror where starttime > {0}) err 
on SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(sq.filepath,'/',-1),'.',1) = err.error_token
